General.Name: Alrov Properties & Lodgings Ltd
General.Description: Alrov Properties and Lodgings Ltd., a real estate development company, invests in and operates real estate projects in Israel, the United Kingdom, France, Switzerland, and the Netherlands. Its projects include investment properties and residential projects, as well as develops, owns, and operates 5-star luxury hotels. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.
General.Address: The Alrov Tower, Tel Aviv, Israel, 66883
